_88track.description: A list of tracks that belong to this type. The first track is considered as the main track representing this type.

___primary.description: When there are multiple tracks for this track type, set this field to 'true' to express that this is the primary track to represent this track type.

___description_url.description: The URL of the document giving more information about this dataset track.

___big_data_url.description: The URL from where this dataset track can be obtained online.

___subtype.description: If there are multiple files for this track type, use this free text field to put more information about what kind of information this track represents.

___sample_source.description: Use this field if the track belongs to only one/some sample(s) of a merged dataset.

oneOf.description: When the experiment belongs to a single sample, put one sample ID here.
When the experiment belongs to multiple samples, put a list of IDs here.
